Name: Leonidah's Group
description:
Leonidah has six children and is representing her group, formed by nine farmers in Kakamega B (North) District, Kenya. She joined One Acre Fund for the first time in 2013 and decided to represent her group because she wanted to help more farmers.

With a portion of this loan, Leonidah will not only purchase maize seeds and fertilizer for the coming harvesting season, but also a solar light. Receiving a solar light as part of her loan means that now she will be able to have light during the night and have somewhere to charge her phone.

Leonidah plans to use the profits she gains this year to send her children to school.

In total Leonidahâ€™s Group will use the inputs received from this loan to plant a total of four acres of land. They will also receive a total of five solar lights.
